author: Simon Difford
description: An Orange Daiquiri with orange juice notes amplified by cognac orange liqueur.
name: Naranja Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 50 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
20 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
